name: Wings of Fury (1987)
description: Wings of Fury is an action game with some minor simulation aspects, in which the player assumes role of pilot of an American F6F Hellcat plane aboard the USS Wasp in the Pacific during World War II. The original Apple II version, programmed by Steve Waldo, was released in 1987 by Brøderbund. It was ported in 1989 to the X68000 and in 1990 to Amstrad CPC, Commodore 64, Amiga and MS-DOS, and in 1999 to Game Boy Color.
